name: MTLIndirectComputeCommand
desc: A compute command in an indirect command buffer.

items.name: func setComputePipelineState(MTLComputePipelineState)
items.desc: Sets the commandâ€™s compute pipeline state object.

items.name: func setImageblockWidth(Int, height: Int)
items.desc: Sets the size, in pixels, of the imageblock.

items.name: func setKernelBuffer(MTLBuffer, offset: Int, at: Int)
items.desc: Sets a buffer for the compute function.

items.name: func setThreadgroupMemoryLength(Int, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets the size of a block of threadgroup memory.

items.name: func setStageInRegion(MTLRegion)
items.desc: Sets the region of the stage-in attributes to apply to the compute kernel.

items.name: func setBarrier()
items.desc: Adds a barrier to ensure that commands executed prior to this command are complete before this command executes.

items.name: func clearBarrier()
items.desc: Removes any barrier set on the command.

items.name: func concurrentDispatchThreadgroups(MTLSize, threadsPerThreadgroup: MTLSize)
items.desc: Encodes a compute command using a grid aligned to threadgroup boundaries.

items.name: func concurrentDispatchThreads(MTLSize, threadsPerThreadgroup: MTLSize)
items.desc: Encodes a compute command using an arbitrarily sized grid.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Resets the command to its default state.
